description: Scrape any website instantly and get consistent structured data in seconds without writing any CSS selector code

api_key.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

url.info: URL of the page to scrape. Either url or html is required, but not both.

html.info: HTML content to scrape. Either url or html is required, but not both.

element_prompts.info: Items on the page to be scraped (maximum 5). E.g. 'Plan price', 'Plan title'

root_element_selector.info: CSS selector to limit the scope of scraping to a specific element and its children

errors.import_error: JigsawStack package not found. Please install it using: pip install jigsawstack>=0.2.7
errors.url_or_html_required: Either 'url' or 'html' must be provided for scraping

logs.using_html: Using HTML content for scraping (length: {length} characters)
logs.scrape_complete: AI scrape process is now complete.
